text: In Vaishnavism, the Satvata-tantra describes three different forms, or aspects, of Vishnu as Mahavishnu, Garbhodakshayi Vishnu, Kshirodakashayi Vishnu. Kshirodakashayi Vishnu resides in the hearts of all living creatures as a four handed expansion similar to that of Mahavishnu and Garbhodakshayi Vishnu. He is also referred to as Paramatma or the super soul. His abode is in all beings. Category:Hinduism
title: Kshirodakashayi Vishnu
